name: Blobby & Feather: Joined Together
description:
No matter the weather, Blobby and Feather are always together.

Fly around as a bird, tethered to your indestructible blob friend!

Knock down walls! Bash enemies! Execute a heist! Go Bowling!

See if you can beat all 4 levels!

(Made by 1 person over 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam)
